results.title: Split Enz: 1972-1992
results.brief_description: Spanning a musical career of 20 years this tape contains music clips for the following Split Enz songs; “Late last night”, “Sweet dreams”, “Lovey dovey”, “Bold as brass”, “My mistake”, “I see red”, “Give it a whirl”, “I hope I never”, “I got you”, “One step ahead”, “History never repeats”, “I don’t wanna dance”, Six months in a leaky boat”, “Dirty creature”, “Never ceases to amaze me”, Next exit”, “Message to my girl”, “Strait old line”, and “I Walk away”.

results.title: Split cherry tree
results.creator_credit: Jan Saunders, Learning Corporation of America and Andrei Konchalovsky
results.brief_description: Based on a short story by Jesse Stuart about the son of a poor uneducated farming couple who must stay after school to work off a debt incurred by breaking a cherry tree during a biology excursion. This angers and humiliates his father, who sets off for school to teach “that modern professor” a lesson. Instead it is he who learns a lesson: education is important, and his son deserves a chance for a better life. Cast includes Colleen Dewhurst and Will Newman.

results.title: Splintered
results.creator_credit: Stuart Parkyn, Ian Irvine, Peter Templeman and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A film about the unspoken rules of friendship… After leaving his best friend stranded at the scene of their crime, teenager Gavin struggles with the guilt of his actions and desperately tries to regain his mate’s trust.

results.title: Splendours of Britain
results.creator_credit: Robert Angell, British Tourist Authority and John Abbott
results.brief_description: An introduction to the heraldry and pageantry of Great Britain. Shows the work involved in creating a coat of arms; Salisbury Cathedral; the Queen and Knights of the Thistle attending a service at St. Giles; Trooping the Colours; scenes of country-side and cities.

results.title: Splash [Italian version]
results.brief_description: A home swimming pool, an accidental drowning, a distraught helpless mother. Such tragedies can be prevented. A poolside seminar demonstrates the dangers and the means of avoiding them, emphasising the need for awareness and the knowledge of basic methods of resuscitation. In Italian language only.

results.title: SPK
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Spirogyra: structure and life functions
results.brief_description: The unaided eye sees Spirogyra as green masses of slimy intertwining filaments. The microscope reveals detailed cellular structures, including nucleus, cytoplasm, chloroplasts and pyrenoids - the length and diameter of a spirogyra cell, and in a culture we observe growth and sexual reproduction.

results.title: Spirits from the past
results.creator_credit: Hugh Burnett and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Looks at the claims that famous men and women from the past are still working creatively with people alive today. Three people speak about their experiences and beliefs, and claim to be in touch with dead musicians; receiving new music from many composers such as Liszt, Chopin, Beethoven, Brahms and Stravinsky.
